title: Gender bender Skins
body:
We have all these cool champions by Riot and skins for the champions. People have come up with many skin ideas and some skins comes from a player like us. One day one of my friend and I suddenly thought about the gender bender skins, female {{champion:86}} , {{champion:122}} , {{champion:64}} , and male {{champion:103}} , {{champion:37}} ? I know its a huge work to make those skins for each and every champ but you know its just an idea and having to think/imagine how they would look like if they were to change. ;)

(If you do happen to design a gender bender skin for them plz post here I want to see :P)

replies.body:
I talked about this to my friend years ago, 100% would buy even for champs i didnt main, its a great idea and i love it! BUMP!

Edit: Though if they did that they would have to redo voices and in that thinking it would be limited few who get genderbent because of the money that would go into it. (Also if you look up Genderbent league of legends theres HEAPS of art).

Awesome! Sweet I'll check it out, thnks :D

Btw just thought of female Teemo's laugh...{{champion:17}}  oh nose

Honestly if they did Gender bending skins they'd probably have to be legendary worthy (the 2k RP sort of skin) as they would have to get another voice actor in to do all the cross gender voicing.

I doubt they would do a gender bend at a 950 skin (aside for the more macho female sort of ones like commando lux).
Ik ik, its just an idea and for us to imagine but would be awesome if they did make it
